threads.title: a1707 - 820-00281 - stuck on batter logo with lighting,
threads.message:
, [ATTACH type="full" width="342px" alt="i.jpg"]59992[/ATTACH][ATTACH type="full" width="477px" alt=";.jpg"]59993[/ATTACH]



got this macbook it is tuck on battery logo with lighting under, draws 1.04 when battery logo comes up, then goes back to 0, and 20V

any ideas. maybe knows issue someone has already fixed,

threads.title: a1707 - 820-00281 - stuck on batter logo with lighting,
threads.message: Test with both battery and charger connected.

threads.title: a1707 - 820-00281 - stuck on batter logo with lighting,
threads.message: i did and no difference at all,

threads.title: a1707 - 820-00281 - stuck on batter logo with lighting,
threads.message:
Is the battery charging?
Did you test with known good battery?
Don't trust new chinese batteries.

Also try with other 87W original charger and 96W one too.
